gitlab.title: GitLab - Remote Work Pioneer
gitlab.content: GitLab is an all-remote company with over 2,000 employees across 65+ countries. They have no physical offices and document their remote work practices in a public handbook.

automattic.title: Automattic - Distributed Company
automattic.content: Automattic, the company behind WordPress.com, has been a distributed company since its founding. They operate with a fully remote workforce across multiple time zones.

doist.title: Doist - Async Remote Company
doist.content: Doist, creator of Todoist, operates as a fully remote and asynchronous company. They emphasize async communication and have team members in over 25 countries.

fda_ai_medical.title: FDA Regulation of AI in Medical Devices
fda_ai_medical.content: The FDA regulates AI and machine learning-based medical devices through established pathways. The regulatory process includes premarket review, quality management, and post-market surveillance. The FDA has cleared over 500 AI/ML-enabled medical devices as of 2024.

fda_software_medical.title: FDA Software as Medical Device (SaMD)
fda_software_medical.content: FDA regulates Software as Medical Device (SaMD) which includes AI-powered diagnostic and clinical decision support systems. The agency has developed specific frameworks for adaptive AI algorithms.

remote_work_growth.title: Remote Work Statistics 2023-2025
remote_work_growth.content: Remote work adoption accelerated during 2020-2021. By 2023, approximately 12-16% of workers were fully remote, with hybrid arrangements becoming common. Studies show productivity often increases or remains stable with remote work.

ai_healthcare_adoption.title: AI Adoption in Healthcare
ai_healthcare_adoption.content: AI adoption in healthcare has grown significantly, with the market projected to reach $188 billion by 2030. The COVID-19 pandemic accelerated digital health adoption by an estimated 5-10 years.

startup_survival.title: Startup Survival and Break-Even Statistics
startup_survival.content: Studies show approximately 90% of startups fail. Bootstrapped startups often take 18-24 months to reach break-even, while VC-backed companies may take longer due to growth focus. Break-even timelines vary significantly by industry.

remote_work_2025.title: Remote Work Predictions for 2025
remote_work_2025.content: Industry analysts predict that by 2025, 70-80% of knowledge workers will have some form of remote or hybrid work arrangement. Fully remote positions are expected to stabilize at 15-20% of the workforce.

ai_clinical_integration.title: AI Integration in Clinical Settings
ai_clinical_integration.content: Predictions suggest AI will become increasingly integrated into clinical workflows for tasks like diagnostic assistance, patient monitoring, and administrative work. However, AI is expected to augment rather than replace clinicians in the near term.

async_communication.title: Asynchronous Communication in Remote Work
async_communication.content: Async communication refers to communication that doesn't require immediate response, such as email, recorded videos, or documentation. It's a key practice for distributed teams across time zones.

ai_diagnostic_tools.title: AI-Powered Diagnostic Tools
ai_diagnostic_tools.content: AI diagnostic tools use machine learning to analyze medical images, lab results, and patient data to assist in diagnosis. These tools are designed to be assistive rather than autonomous, supporting clinical decision-making.
